summary: hi im a lesbian of tall goblin stature (5'5") and i've hung out at the end of a bed many times (id probably sleep there but im a...
question: hi im a lesbian of tall goblin stature (5'5") and i've hung out at the end of a bed many times (id probably sleep there but im a kicky sleeper and my friends like their faces the way they are)
answer: Honestly if all I were to ever receive in my inbox was people describing their creative bed sharing arrangements I would not be upset. This is inspired and all goblins should feel comfortable and respected sitting/sleeping at the foot of the bed if they so choose.

reblog.comment: Honestly if all I were to ever receive in my inbox was people describing their creative bed sharing arrangements I would not be upset. This is inspired and all goblins should feel comfortable and respected sitting/sleeping at the foot of the bed if they so choose.

trail.content_raw: Honestly if all I were to ever receive in my inbox was people describing their creative bed sharing arrangements I would not be upset. This is inspired and all goblins should feel comfortable and respected sitting/sleeping at the foot of the bed if they so choose.

blog.name: hazelcephalopod
blog.title: Another Side of the Mirror
blog.description:
This has mostly turned into a CR blog-thing... I tag Thursday show until around Tuesday.

Hello peoples of Tumblr! This is my blog, which I make no promise to keep up with. I'm a bisexual Autistic. Also have ADD. I like cephalopods, especially cuttlefish, and plants, and reading, and many other geeky things.

More random tidbit: feminist, somewhere in the left politically, and tired of the political landscape but still trying to care. Also a lapsed pagan, it sounds like nonsense but idk how else to describe it. More things- gluten free, and crochet, knitting, and others. Beware of my many random posts as well.

That is all for now!

Oh BTW I am bad at tagging things, trying to get better, but its a work in progress.

body:
More Critical Role, Fjord

I left this in the tag before but decided to put it here

I have trouble relating to Fjord the most, I’m not sure what exactly he’s doing or who he is. Lately though I’m beginning to believe he isn’t either, he has no idea what he’s doing, and most certainly no idea who he *is* -the last one might be a given, he’s an orphan whose had all this weird recently thrust upon him. In short, he is a wreck. Just touching things on impulse, and shoving random, usually dangerous, objects into his body. Hoping someone might stop him(?), or his Vandren.dad-figure might show up, or this will offer some revelation as to what the hell is going on?!

reblog.comment:
More Critical Role, Fjord

I left this in the tag before but decided to put it here

I have trouble relating to Fjord the most, I’m not sure what exactly he’s doing or who he is. In short, he is a wreck. Just touching things on impulse, and shoving random, usually dangerous, objects into his body. Hoping someone might stop him(?), or his Vandren.dad-figure might show up, or this will offer some revelation as to what the hell is going on?!

I left this in the tag before but decided to put it here

I have trouble relating to Fjord the most, I’m not sure what exactly he’s doing or who he is. Lately though I’m beginning to believe he isn’t either, he has no idea what he’s doing, and most certainly no idea who he *is* -the last one might be a given, he’s an orphan whose had all this weird recently thrust upon him. In short, he is a wreck. Just touching things on impulse, and shoving random, usually dangerous, objects into his body. Hoping someone might stop him(?), or his Vandren.dad-figure might show up, or this will offer some revelation as to what the hell is going on?!

summary: Been practising my pixel art and here’s a tiny animated Scanlan!! [Image Description: an animated pixel bust of Scanlan...
body:
Been practising my pixel art and here’s a tiny animated Scanlan!!

[Image Description: an animated pixel bust of Scanlan Shorthalt, dark skin, dark purple eyes, and long brown hair over his left shoulder. He has a curious look on his face, blinks twice, and his pointy ears do a little wiggle]

tags: idk i have trouble relating to fjord the most
but am beginning to believe he isnt sure what he is doing either
just touching things and shoving objects into his body hoping someone might stop him
or his vandren.dad figure will show up
or this will offer some revelation as to what the hell is going on
body:
Critical Role, controversial opinion

Fjord is not dad, he’s too much of a dumbass. He’s the uncle who appears competent at first with his fancy words and accent, but beneath that is a confused disaster man. He got dropped with these kids and is doing his best but really it’s just “fake it and hope it works”.

Taliesin: It was devastating for both me and the fans...
body:
Travis: I actively do not want to play any romance this campaign

Fandom:

Taliesin: It was devastating for both me and the fans to lose such a positive and beloved bi character, but don’t worry, I can just come back gayer

Fandom: Dibs!!! (Also if you read this character as gay you’re a demon)
